title: ♪ This Flex don't feel like Ranked ♪

replies.body: This flex Que is gotta to be the worst thing for their community..i was just in a game that had some newer ppl to the ranked scene...they were against a D4 plat 5 and some golds...way to set them up for the long haul. poor guys, i really wanna support this community, but when that happens, i have a hard time keeping faith. please try to fix it for the newer ppl.

You guys do realize that all these Diamonds, Plats and Golds are actually ranked as such only in Solo/Duo and their Flex rank is around Silver because it's new and it starts everybody at the same MMR ? Right ? 

Give it time and all the Diamonds with climb to Diamond and all the Bronzies with fall to Bronze and it will be business as usual. Give it time, everyone will eventually settle where they belong.

> [{quoted}](name=haaaaaaaalp,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=r9yK563d,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2016-11-13T14:46:18.577+0000)
>
> I mean people said the same thing about dynamic queue and it still sucks as a ranked queue. Flex/dynamic queue simply does not belong in a ranked environment.

Dynamic didn't have a hard reset of MMR. It's not even remotely the same scenario. DQ's MMR and placements were based on season 5's Solo/Duo MMR.
Then don't play it! Holy crap.  Go play normals then and wait for soloq to come out.  Everyone else will play flex queue in the meantime and not bitch about it because we know what it is.

I played a flex queue with bronze 4 and unranked for some reason. I am currently in d5 and it is unreasonable to have such a huge difference between players, Riot pls fix it. It makes the game very unpleasant.

Flex que is the exact same thing as dynamic que just without the 4 man premades.

The discrepancy comes from the mmr reset and would happen anyways regardless of que (gonna happen again when S7 starts).  No ranked que feels like proper ranked after a reset.

except it isn't "exactly like Dynamic"

as you can see, not just me but everyone else can see the skill level differences in this Flex que is stupid

Read the last line...

> The discrepancy comes from the mmr reset and would happen anyways regardless of que

Just use it to troll like I do....its hilarious to get matched with Silver kids during my placemtns and dunk them with useless builds like full crit Jax

http://prntscr.com/d6gmfc
Riot is nowhere to be found. :]

I just got matched up with silvers, golds, and platinum all in one game.  There was so much skill level difference and your right we can't take it seriously at the moment. Congrats to our 0-10 top who was silver that made everybody afk lol.
Cause the matchmaking is fucked up.The skill difference is just beyond stupid.All my games are 50/50.you stomp enemy or you get stomped...
try being put into a game against 2 diamonds a plat and 2 golds as a bronze4
This ranked sucks...what can I tell get platiniums against .......I am silver and in our tm one gold >> is this equal or joke?
so a plat5, gold3, gold2, silver3, and a bronze4 walk into a bar......... is the punch line of like every game i have had in flex que so far and it never ends with me taking the W
